org.eclipse.gef

Interface MouseWheelHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseWheelZoomHandler

    public interface MouseWheelHandler
    MouseWheelHandlers can be registered on an EditPartViewer with keys generated by the KeyGenerator. GEF tools delegate handling of mouse-wheel events to MouseWheelHandlers, if there are no drag trackers active.
    Since:
    3.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MouseWheelHandler.KeyGenerator
      A utility class used to generate keys from a given stateMask.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleMouseWheel(Event event, EditPartViewer viewer)
      Handles mouse-wheel events.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMouseWheel

        void handleMouseWheel(Event event,
                    EditPartViewer viewer)
        Handles mouse-wheel events. If the given event was handled in some way, its doit field should be set to false so as to prevent further processing of that event.
        Parameters:
        event - The SWT event that was generated as a result of the mouse-wheel scrolling
        viewer - The originating viewer
